detectors.description: Airdropper.airdropNoLock(address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#591-601) ignores return value by _xank.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_xank.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#594)

Airdropper.airdropNoLock(address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#591-601) ignores return value by _xank.transfer(recipient[i],amount[i]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#596)

Airdropper.airdropNoLock(address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#591-601) ignores return value by _xank.transfer(msg.sender,_xank.balanceOf(address(this))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#600)

detectors.description:
Freezer.freeze(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#310-317) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(freezing[dsc] == false,Freeze/Already-Freezed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#312)

Freezer.unFreeze(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#324-330) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(freezing[dsc] == true,Freeze/Already-Unfreezed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#325)

Freezer.isFreezed(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#300-303) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(freezing[src] == false,Freeze/Fronzen-Account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#301)

Pauser.pause() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#356-362) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(pausing == false,Pause/Already-Pausing) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#357)

Pauser.resume() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#364-370) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(pausing == true,Pause/Already-Resuming) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#365)

Pauser.isPause() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#351-354) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(pausing == false,Pause/Pause-Functionality) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#352)

Minter.finishMint() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#438-446) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(minting == true,Minter/Already-Finish) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#439)

Minter.isMinting() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#429-432) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(minting == true,Minter/Finish-Minting) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#430)
Variable Airdropper._xank (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#586) is not in mixedCase

Xank.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#471-577) uses literals with too many digits:
	- totalSupply = 1000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#477)

detectors.description:
airdropNoLock(address[],uint256[]) should be declared external:
	- Airdropper.airdropNoLock(address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#591-601)

airdropWithLock(address[],uint256[]) should be declared external:
	- Airdropper.airdropWithLock(address[],uint256[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdropper.sol#603-613)
